translations: n.两人一组，两个一组；两人玩的游戏，两人游戏

phrs.translation: 两人一组, 两个一组, 途尚咖啡, 两人玩的游戏
途尚咖啡, 咖啡馆, 两居室, 天空咖啡厅

sentences.sentence: He and John make a nice twosome.
Not every sign is delirious about being part of a perfectly matched twosome.
sentences.translation: 不是每一个星座都着迷于投身到完全和谐的二人世界之中。

sentences.sentence: MICHAEL We do everything as a twosome, from sharing our commute to working out to eating lunch.
sentences.translation: 迈克尔： 我们做什么事都在一起，一起坐车上班，一起吃午饭。
